{{Infobox Artist Discography |Artist = [[Dmitry Koldun]] |Studio = 1 |Studio link = Studio albums |Compilation = 1 |Comp link = Compilation albums |Video = |Video link = Video albums |B-sides = |B-sides link = B-sides |Singles = 4 |Singles link = Singles |Music videos = 7 |MV link = Music videos |References = Yes |Ref link = }} This is a comprehensive listing of official releases by '''[[Dmitry Koldun]]''', a [[Belarus]]sian [[pop rock]] singer. Kodun has released four [[single (music)|singles]] and four [[music video]]s. Koldun is currently working on his first [[studio album]] and has a [[Fan (person)|fan]]-made [[compilation album]]. Title |- | 2006 | ÐÑÑÑ ÐÐ¾Ð¶ÐµÑ * Russian version of ''Maybe'' performed with George Koldun (Koldun's brother) |- | 2007 | Work Your Magic * Available on [[Work Your Magic (album)|Work Your Magic album]] and ''Magic Wrks in Europe'' |- | 2007 | ÐÐ°Ð¹ ÐÐ½Ðµ Ð¡Ð¸Ð»Ñ * Available on [[Work Your Magic (album)|Work Your Magic album]] and ''Magic Works in Europe'' |- | 2007 | Ð¯ ÐÐ»Ñ TÐµÐ±Ñ |- | 2008 | Ð§Ð°-Ð§Ð°-Ð§Ð° * Special New Year video & song, shown on Channel 1 Russia |- | 2008 | Ð¦Ð°ÑÐµÐ²Ð½Ð° |- | 2009 | [[Tune in to Me|ÐÐ°ÑÑÑÐ¾Ð¹ÑÑ Ð½Ð° ÐÐµÐ½Ñ]] |} ===DVDs=== Koldun currently has two DVDs, one included with the [[Work Your Magic (album)|Work Your Magic album]]. The DVD included with the album features the video to [[Work Your Magic]] in both English and Russian. Koldun's other DVD ''Magic Works in Europe'' is a documentary that looks at Koldun's life, his tour around Europe prior to the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2007]], rehearsels in [[Helsinki]] and the music video to Work Your Magic. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Dmitry Koldun}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Koldun, Dmitry}} [[Category:Pop music discographies]] [[Category:Discographies of Belarusian artists]] [[Category:Articles containing Belarusian language text]]
